snippet: Delta Airlines recently announced that it would probably drop or reduce air service to 24 smaller cities, but Hibbing officials say the flights are important to them.
lead_paragraph: Delta Airlines recently announced that it would probably drop or reduce air service to 24 smaller cities, but Hibbing officials say the flights are important to them.

headline.main: From Hibbing, Minn., a Plea for Planes to Keep Flying
headline.print_headline: From Hibbing, Minn., a Plea for Planes to Keep Flying
headline.seo: From Hibbing, Minn., a Plea for Planes to Keep Flying
